hl.seg: Tea: An effective treatment of Lung Cancer.

doc.seg: New research shows that drinking three cups of tea day
greatly reduces the risk of the lung cancer in women under the age of 50.
This research from the Moffet Cancer Centre in Florida says that the chances of contracting lung cancer in women under the age of 50
who drink tea three times a day, are reduced by 37%
The research also said that having more than three cups of tea daily in women over the age of 50 has on special benefits.
Experts believe that the reason behind this is that tea has some elements that are effective against the formation of cancer cells in women mainly under the age of 50.
More than 5000 women who had lung cancer were treated in the Moffet Cancer Center, in Tampa, Florida.
They were aged between 29 to 74.
Researchers compared their medical records and lifestyles to women who were free of lung cancer.
Experts also discovered that tea was mainly effective on a certain type of cancer, called lopler, and was reduced by 66 %.
Every 10th patient of lung cancer falls under this type of cancer.
This type of cancer is especially dangerous because it is deeper than most, and is usually only discoverable when it has spread significantly.
Experts say that younger females can greatly reduce the risk of lung cancer by regularly drinking three cups of tea every day.
They say that incorporating tea in the daily life can greatly reduce the risk of any cancer.
In Britain, more than 40,000 women are diagnosed with lung cancer every year.

A team of doctors used High Frequency rays to determine the functioning of the heart.

Experts have concentrated mainly on the left side of the heart which is mainly responsible for the pumping of blood.
They discovered that with increase in age, the problems in the rate of heart relaxation also increase.
